name: Aniket Khaire
body:
### Hi There!
As long as I remember, I've always been a tinkerer. When I was 16, I first had an encounter with programming, C++ programming and then it all began. My love and understanding of Algorithms helped me score maximum grades in my High School. This encouraged me to pursue Computer Engineering in one of the best universities of the World, University of Pune.

Today, I am a Graduate Student with a background in professional software development. I have worked as a Software Engineer for Persistent Systems, India before arriving to The United States to pursue Masters in Computer Software Engineering at San Jose State University, California.

Currently, I am looking for internship opportunity in the field of software development. You can find my resume [HERE](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B3JxszMnsD_9WVNEU1VYT3pWa28)

### Technical Skills
* **Programming Languages:** C, C ++, Java, Go
* **Database:** SQL, MySQL, MongoDB
* **Development Tools:** Eclipse, Greenfoot, Brackets
* **Operating Systems:** Windows, Linux
* **Frameworks:** Spring MVC, AngularJS
* **Methodology:** Agile, Scrum
* **Web Technologies:** HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, AngularJS, RESTful Web Services, JSON

### Education
* **San Jose State University** MS - Computer Software Engineering (August 2015 - Present)
* **University of Pune** BE - Computer Engineering (August 2010 - May 2014)

### Professional Experience
**Software Engineer, Persistent Systems,** Pune, India
* Was responsible to create application sandbox to realize the POC (proof of concepts) by the team.
* Fulfilled responsibilities like designing and developing database schema, developing UI using Angular templates, fetching business APIs, hosting and deploying applications over Amazon Web Services and suggesting improvements in the product.

**Project Intern, Persistent Systems,** Pune, India
* Studied Salesforce and developed a tool, intended for Salesforce developers, which eases up the workflow rule creation process.
* The allowed Salesforce developer, to create a workflow rule, edit existing rules and deploy them onto their org on-the-fly.

### Achievements

* **Student of the Year, 2014 - Sinhgad Academy of Engineering, Pune.**
* **Cognizant Certified Student, 2013**
* **Academic Topper, G.S. Moze College of Arts, Science and Commerce, Pune.**

### Projects

**Visual Editor for Workflow Rules in Salesforce, Persistent Systems, Pune**
* Technologies	: Salesforce, APEX, Visaulforce, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript libraries (jsZip, jQueryUI), Git
* Created a tool which dynamically generates a flowchart-like structure on completion of every step of Workflow creation rule in Salesforce. This was achieved with the help of metadata API of Salesforce. 
* The project bagged highest grades in a class of 90 students and landed me and my team a job at Persistent Systems.

**Amazon EC2 Instance Monitoring, San Jose State University, USA**
* Technologies	: Amazon EC2, Elastic Search, Python, Kibana
* The application would fetch real time data from various EC2 instances under supervision and generate graphs on Kibana, indicating the instances under high load in terms of CPU utilization, Network I/O utilization, Disk utilization and Memory Utilization.
* [Source Code](https://github.com/cmpe273projectec2/Amazon-Instance-Monitoring)

**Java to UML generator, San Jose State University, USA**
* Successful parsing of java source code, recognizing class declaration, methods, public/private members and relationships. Engineered design and development of in-memory data structures to store the parsed information. Explored and implemented native java parser using ‘javaparser‘ library. 
* The project scored full grades (100/100) for Systems Software Engineering Coursework at SJSU. [Source Code](https://github.com/aniketkhaire/CodeToUML)

**Combat Fighter, San Jose State University, USA**
* Created a 2D interactive game using Greenfoot game engine. Implemented 6 design patterns to address different functionalities of the game. [Link to commercial video] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vaGFI3C14C0)

**Shortest Trip Planner, San Jose State University, USA**
* Developed an interactive application, which would determine the shortest trip, based on price estimates provided by Uber API.
* The user could see the order in which he should visit cities and even the estimated price.
* Studied an implemented Travelling Salesman Problem. [Source Code](https://github.com/aniketkhaire/Shortest-Trip-Planner)
* Technologies : Go, Uber API, Google API, MongoDB

**Online Stock Management System, San Jose State University, USA**
* Developed a simple client-server model in Go programming language and utilized Yahoo API to fetch stock information.
* The user was able to buy stocks, check whether he gained profit or incurred loss.  [Source Code](https://github.com/aniketkhaire/Online-Stock-Management)
* Technologies : Go, Yahoo API, MongoDB

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this portfolio? Check out my [resume] (https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B3JxszMnsD_9WVNEU1VYT3pWa28) or connect me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aniketkhaire).
